title: This was pretty damn funny
body:
I had a match today where I bought Banner of Command {{item:3060}} and promoted a cannon minion with it. It proceeded down lane until it got to an Azir. He starts complaining in all chat that the minion is bugged because he can't kill it. 

I laughed so hard I had tears.

replies.body:
{{champion:268}} Enemy Minion, I order you to die!
Minion: No
{{champion:268}} But, But, the order was given...
{{champion:45}} I REFUSE TO DIE
That's... That's... actually really sad.
iM crYing.
Banner is the greatest gift from Riot against an AP trying to split push. It's just...sad watching them struggle against it.

Build it in lane VS an Azir or Annie.
Proceed to laugh.
. . . Or roam.

> [{quoted}](name=Ariel the Cruel,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=LfENehdE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-10-05T13:46:08.221+0000)
>
> Build it in lane VS an Azir or Annie.
> Proceed to laugh.
> . . . Or roam.

I might try this just for fun.

Whenever i play {{champion:40}} support, the Banner is usually the 3rd item i build after SS and {{item:3069}}, i love using it on a lane that gets no traffic because of team fights and such and 10mins later hearing "*Your team has destroyed an Inhibitor!!*" Or when i had one team rage at me because i solo killed 2 towers in a row because of a banner minion, and no one came to stop me because "Amg Janna soooo weak, she won't get the turret anyway, so not going to waste time running all the way to bot lane to stop her."xD

I think banner was meant to prevent people like Ziggs or Victor from clearing the wave from 2 miles away and making siege impossible.

Not necesarrily to stop a split push.

Eh, doesn't really help at all in a seige, if you use it on the lane you're in then the ADC will just kill it and if you use it on an off lane then because they have Ziggs, they're free to send someone to deal with it.
The intent doesn't mean much when Lissandra is up there crying XD
Zzrot placed behind a tower is better for defence (even stops adcs from sieging) Banner is better for pushing offensively.
{{champion:268}} I'VE BEEN COMPROMISED.

#SionMidWithBannerOfCommandWasUsedInLCKAndItWasAwesome

I forget the counterpick was for tho, most likely an Azir

It was Leblanc mid. 
Byebye leblanc roaming
I know a guy that went from bronze to gold (so far) maining sion mid with zzrot rush. I guess he sets it there to farm and push for him while he roams or gets jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=GastonBoucher,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=LfENehdE,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-10-06T12:21:20.857+0000)
>
> I know a guy that went from bronze to gold (so far) maining sion mid with zzrot rush. I guess he sets it there to farm and push for him while he roams or gets jungle.

Funny seeing you here again.
{{champion:268}} _"Shurima, your minion is out of control!"_
Try this in one for all vs tahm. When he tries to eat a promoted minion, it just gets out of his mouth and keeps going.

> [{quoted}](name=ChaosThief,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=LfENehdE,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-10-05T20:28:53.814+0000)
>
> Try this in one for all vs tahm. When he tries to eat a promoted minion, it just gets out of his mouth and keeps going.

One for all isn't out yet.
When it does come out. It will in a week or two, I believe.
Banner of Command is one of the most underrated items in the game. I build it on my support every game.

Build zzrot too? I like to go gragas or malph with them top. Would be so good if someone else also bought them cause together you can push 2 lanes or strongly push one whilw grouping mid. Ppl dont want to do fun tactics though.

Bought this vs a full ap team and their vlad and brand spent time killing it in top while we went 5v3 pushing bot. I wish more ppl would buy it. I have gone zzrot and banner of command many times kind of as a troll tactic. Always try to convince support to buy them as well.
Now if only we could activate it on eachother.
best part is when buffing a cannon minion with baron buff. it's so far out of range they can't kill it when sieging and just laugh as the cannon minion takes down turret while they can't do anything.

The biggest LOL I had with Banner of Command was in URF. Most people picked AP champs in URF and I watched as piles of Banner'd up minions swarmed their base and they could do nothing about it. It was the best fun in URF that I had.

Also, {{champion:36}} is crazy good in URF.
{{champion:105}} what the fuck not even I can kill it
I love this item.{{item:3060}}
XD
omg lol
Were you the support or the midlaner?
I was the support.
Just imagine if promoted minions auto-taunted AP champs. They'd have no choice but to suffer.
LOL
You gotta love that immunity to magic damage xD
